author: @matchapuff1555
text:
Since a lot of you already wrote a comment abt Yoongi and Tae, I'll just write a comment about those Armys shouting/cheering so loud.

Even though we aren't really a big fandom from the start, it makes me proud hearing those loud and genuine cheers from Armys in this video. I don't know, but meeting or watching 2013(although this video was from 2014) Armys really makes me emotional and proud. Like, I really do respect and envy them, they were with BTS during those really hard times. I am a 2018 Army anyways. Glad I meet them even though I am a bit late. Salute to all the 2013 Armys out there who are still strong and supporting BTS :))

(STREAM BE + DYNAMITE HOLIDAY REMIX AND TAE BIRTHDAY GOALS ANYWAYS)

[15/9 11.13] Ysasfaafyqaakp Ki: Woro-woro. 
Assalamualaikum wr. wb.
Kepada Yth,
Ketua Rt 001-010 di tempat.

Dengan hormat,
Terkait perihal pendaftaran Izin UMKM sebagai pedagang atau pelaku usaha untuk didaftarkan membuat *Surat Ijin Usaha UMKM,* maka dengan ini bagi warga yang punya usaha kelontong, warung atau pelaku usaha lain dapat mendaftarkan diri ke Rw dengan syarat sebagai berikut : 
1. Surat Pengantar RT *"membuat Surat Ijin Usaha Kecil dan Menengah"* 
2. Fotocopy KTP DKI dan KK
*Dimohon warga segera mendaftarkan diri ke RW sampai hari Minggu 30 Agustus 2020* supaya bisa didaftarkan ke Izin UMKM Kecamatan  melalui PTSP Kelurahan. 
Atas perhatiannya pengurus Rw ucapkan terima kasih. 
Wassalam

author: @justiceforjimin9622
text:
This is why BTS is more popular than other idols and gain more fans because BTS makes every hour or minute useful by using armys.They always make time for us no matter the situation.If they are stressed they still think about us.

I'm not saying other idols don't make time or give so much love to their fans but BTS is very different.The love that bts shows is different.💜

And other idol's are too worked up at times and usually just want to do their best for more fame or regognition.BUT bts just do it for armys,they do it to make sure we're either happy,laughing,crying or moody.

And armys can sometimes care less about what people think about BTS(despie them calling us toxic *which we are not* )Armys just wanna make sure haters don't cross the line about bts bc if a hater says something disrespectful about bts armys know that BTS achieve more and are more recognized than their idols.


BTSxARMY💜

author: @orangeblossom5986
text: Hey 2014 방탄소년단, in 2016 you will win Daesang awards. As of December 3, 2016, upon which I'm currently typing this message, you won Album of the Year in Melon Music Awards and just last night you won Artist of the Year on Mnet Asian Music Awards (and more so in the future, I predict!) also, you won best dance performance after how many years! We are so proud of you! I'm so happy that you never gave up! Your fanbase got soooo big! And you know what else? You never changed through the years.... Thank you for being an inspiration. Thank you for being yourselves. Thank you for flying with us. Thank you for growing with us. When we see you, we can smile.. And laugh.. I only hope to see you cry tears of joy and not sadness. We are terribly sorry for all the haters and antis. We hope we could shield you from them just as much you shield us from the pain of the world.
